title: Le Mourin
text: Le Mourin is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the Swiss <a href="Pennine%20Alps">Pennine Alps</a>, located west of <a href="Bourg-Saint-Pierre">Bourg-Saint-Pierre</a> in the canton of <a href="Valais">Valais</a>. On its south-east side the mountain overlooks the <a href="Lac%20des%20Toules">Lac des Toules</a>.
